p: Can you let Alice have $10 until our next trip East the end of April and the first week of May? I'll be grateful of you if you can.

Essentially, everything is going finely. I'm constantly being surprised at the way Jed Smith surges ahead, and I'm eager to get up early every morning to hear more of a tale that certainly seems wise than I am. Macmillans are certainnly eager for it, and ,at the least calculation, the preliminary publication of Jed in the Spring of '41 and Cycle within a year there after will give us a somewhat better grip. But I am going ahead with a joyous absence of hope that is a thrilling experience.
it is fine to be approaching the end of a long task, and I know a way , if I am forced to take it, that will solve the problems of the family until I am through.
